channel.description: Recent content in lsd on current and former obsessions

item.title: Ly et al. 2018: Psychedelics Promote Structural and Functional Neural Plasticity.
item.description: Note: This is my first attempt of a detailed literature review for “not-only” scientists. The idea is, instead of “dumbing down” science to a point it is far from true, I will attempt to explain as much as I see necessary. The hope is that the dissection of the articles into easily-understandable pieces will allow a deeper understanding of the subject. I will mainly focus on neuroscience/biology articles surrounding psychedelics, as this is a subject I, and many others, find interesting.
